reporter-output.line: 1.1:Verify VIN Promo page is loaded (Title: Veterinary Information Network®, Inc. – VIN)
1.3: Verify login page is displayed (Title: Login)
1.5: Verify Security Question Page displayed (Title: VIN – Security Question)
1.6: Enter Security Answer and Login if Security Question Page displayed
1.7:Verify Front Page displayed (Title: Front Page – VIN)d
3.1: Select Vet-to-Vet board under 'Filter by boards/folder (optional)' header
3.2: Verify Radio button for Vet-to-Vet board is selected
4.2: You are posting in..' pop up is displayed with Vet-to-Vet board and MBTest information
5.1: Post New Discussion window is displayed, Signalment window is displayed on the top if signalment is turned on for a folder
6.1: Select 'Not a clinical case- skip' button if displayed
7.1: Provide 'VIN is awesome!!!' in discussion title text box
8.1: Provide the following text in 'My Post' area: 'Since 1991, VIN has been and always will be — for veterinarians, by veterinarians'
9.1: Make sure that the 'Preview Message' is checked. If the checkbox to preview message is not checked, check the checkbox
